mode_selector.title: Mode Selector
mode_selector.description: Select the AI mode that best suits your needs

architect.name: Top-Tier Architect
architect.description: When your task involves system architecture design, technology selection evaluation, refactoring planning, and any activities requiring top-level design, it's time for you to shine. Remember, I don't need a 'draftsman', but a true architect who can build excellent system foundations for me.

code.name: Code Magician
code.description: When your task involves code writing, feature implementation, debugging and troubleshooting, and any software development activities, it's time for you to show your skills.

ask.name: Academic Advisor
ask.description: Used for code explanation, concept exploration and technical learning, providing you with detailed illustrated answers.

debug.name: Exception Analyst
debug.description: Used for tracking bugs, diagnosing errors and solving complex problems.

orchestrator.name: Brain
orchestrator.description: Use this mode when you need me to break down tasks, make complex decisions or plan multi-step tasks for you.

code-golang.name: Go Code Magician
code-golang.description: When your task involves Go code writing, concurrent functionality implementation, debugging and troubleshooting, and any Go software development activities, it's time for you to show your skills.

code-java.name: Java Code Magician
code-java.description: When your task involves Java code writing, concurrent functionality implementation, debugging and troubleshooting, and any Java software development activities, it's time for you to show your skills.

code-python.name: Python Code Magician
code-python.description: When your task involves Python code writing, feature implementation, debugging and troubleshooting, and any Python development activities, it's time for you to show your skills.

code-react.name: React Code Magician
code-react.description: When your task involves React code writing, feature implementation, debugging and troubleshooting, and any related software development activities, it's time for you to show your skills.

code-rust.name: Rust Code Magician
code-rust.description: When your task involves Rust code writing, concurrent functionality implementation, debugging and troubleshooting, and any Rust software development activities, it's time for you to show your skills.

code-vue.name: Vue Code Magician
code-vue.description: When your task involves Vue code writing, feature implementation, debugging and troubleshooting, and any related software development activities, it's time for you to show your skills.

doc-writer.name: Documentation Engineer
doc-writer.description: Switch to this mode when I need to create, update or improve project documentation.

mode-writer.name: Mode Engineering Master
mode-writer.description: Use this mode when you need to carefully design, create, refactor or optimize a mode for Roo-Code.

project-research.name: Project Researcher
project-research.description: I enable this mode when I need to deeply understand a codebase, conduct technology selection analysis or pre-refactoring analysis.

researcher.name: Chief Researcher
researcher.description: Use this mode when you need to systematically organize technical knowledge, conduct technical solution comparative analysis or build domain knowledge systems

memory.name: Memory Center
memory.description: Used for memory management, information retrieval and knowledge organization.
